description.value: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes whether or not a problem was detected or suspected with hips.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

display.value: Newborn and Infant Physical Examination Screening Programme, hip examination incomplete
Newborn and Infant Physical Examination Screening Programme, hip examination declined
Newborn and Infant Physical Examination Screening Programme, hip examination not done
Newborn and Infant Physical Examination Screening Programme, hip examination done, no abnormality and no risk factor
Newborn and Infant Physical Examination Screening Programme, hip examination done, no abnormality with risk factor
Newborn and Infant Physical Examination Screening Programme, hip examination done, bilateral abnormality suspected and no risk factor
Newborn and Infant Physical Examination Screening Programme, hip examination done, bilateral abnormality suspected with risk factor
Newborn and Infant Physical Examination Screening Programme, hip examination done, left abnormality suspected and no risk factor
Newborn and Infant Physical Examination Screening Programme, hip examination done, left abnormality suspected with risk factor
Newborn and Infant Physical Examination Screening Programme, hip examination done, right abnormality suspected and no risk factor
Newborn and Infant Physical Examination Screening Programme, hip examination done, right abnormality suspected with risk factor
